headline: How to Make an "About Me" Project
copy: Check out our latest tutorial to learn how to make your own “About Me” project in Scratch!

headline: New Scratch Design Studio!
copy: Make a potion, cast a spell, or combine two objects into one! Create a project filled with magical mixes in this Scratch Design Studio.

headline: Know of an inspiring studio?
copy: Propose it to be featured in the “Featured Studios” row!

headline: New Scratch Design Studio!
copy: From vast oceans to the water you drink, this Scratch Design Studio invites you to create a project around the wonderful world of water!
